title: Hibernate Reactive Error on Persist with PostgisDialect (Hibernate Spatial)
body:
### Describe the bug

When running with Hibernate Reactive, this is the `hibernate:dialect` that is set:

```
hibernate.dialect: io.quarkus.hibernate.orm.runtime.dialect.QuarkusPostgreSQL10Dialect
```

I am using PostGIS (rather than normal Postgres), so I set this:
```
quarkus.hibernate-orm.dialect=org.hibernate.spatial.dialect.postgis.PostgisDialect
```
and I include the dependency:
```
    <dependency>
      <groupId>org.hibernate</groupId>
      <artifactId>hibernate-spatial</artifactId>
      <version>5.6.14.Final</version>
    </dependency>
```
when I do a `persist` such as:

```kotlin
    @POST
    @ReactiveTransactional
    fun addTenant(): Uni<Tenant> {
        val tenant = Tenant()
        tenant.name = "Acme"
        tenant.webDomain = "acme.com"
        return tenantRepository.persist(tenant)
    }
```

I get the following error:

```
2022-12-23 10:48:44,430 TRACE [org.hib.typ.des.sql.BasicBinder] (vert.x-eventloop-thread-1) binding parameter [1] as [TIMESTAMP] - [Fri Dec 23 10:48:44 PST 2022]
2022-12-23 10:48:44,431 TRACE [org.hib.typ.des.sql.BasicBinder] (vert.x-eventloop-thread-1) binding parameter [2] as [TIMESTAMP] - [Fri Dec 23 10:48:44 PST 2022]
2022-12-23 10:48:44,431 TRACE [org.hib.typ.des.sql.BasicBinder] (vert.x-eventloop-thread-1) binding parameter [3] as [VARCHAR] - [Acme]
2022-12-23 10:48:44,431 TRACE [org.hib.typ.des.sql.BasicBinder] (vert.x-eventloop-thread-1) binding parameter [4] as [VARCHAR] - [acme.com]
2022-12-23 10:48:44,431 TRACE [org.hib.typ.des.sql.BasicBinder] (vert.x-eventloop-thread-1) binding parameter [5] as [BIGINT] - [1]
2022-12-23 10:48:44,434 DEBUG [org.hib.cac.int.TimestampsCacheEnabledImpl] (vert.x-eventloop-thread-1) Pre-invalidating space [tenant], timestamp: 1671821384433
2022-12-23 10:48:44,434 DEBUG [org.hib.SQL] (vert.x-eventloop-thread-1) 
    insert 
    into
        tenant
        (date_created, last_modified, name, web_domain, id) 
    values
        (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

Hibernate: 
    insert 
    into
        tenant
        (date_created, last_modified, name, web_domain, id) 
    values
        (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

2022-12-23 10:48:44,443 ERROR [io.qua.ver.htt.run.QuarkusErrorHandler] (vert.x-eventloop-thread-1) HTTP Request to /tenant failed, error id: eb71eacf-7590-4296-806f-6d1308b85bc9-1: jakarta.persistence.PersistenceException: org.hibernate.HibernateException: io.vertx.pgclient.PgException: ERROR: syntax error at or near "," (42601)
        at org.hibernate.internal.ExceptionConverterImpl.convert(ExceptionConverterImpl.java:154)
        at org.hibernate.internal.ExceptionConverterImpl.convert(ExceptionConverterImpl.java:181)

        at io.vertx.core.impl.future.FutureBase.emitFailure(FutureBase.java:75)
        at io.vertx.core.impl.future.FutureImpl.tryFail(FutureImpl.java:230)
        at io.vertx.core.impl.future.PromiseImpl.tryFail(PromiseImpl.java:23)
        at io.vertx.sqlclient.impl.QueryResultBuilder.tryFail(QueryResultBuilder.java:116)
        at io.vertx.core.Promise.fail(Promise.java:89)

        at io.vertx.core.impl.future.FutureImpl$3.onFailure(FutureImpl.java:153)

        at io.vertx.sqlclient.impl.TransactionImpl.lambda$wrap$0(TransactionImpl.java:72)

        ... 32 more

        at io.netty.channel.DefaultChannelPipeline$HeadContext.channelRead(DefaultChannelPipeline.java:1410)

        at io.netty.channel.nio.AbstractNioByteChannel$NioByteUnsafe.read(AbstractNioByteChannel.java:166)
        at io.netty.channel.nio.NioEventLoop.processSelectedKey(NioEventLoop.java:788)
        at io.netty.channel.nio.NioEventLoop.processSelectedKeysOptimized(NioEventLoop.java:724)
        at io.netty.channel.nio.NioEventLoop.processSelectedKeys(NioEventLoop.java:650)
        at io.netty.channel.nio.NioEventLoop.run(NioEventLoop.java:562)
        ... 4 more


2022-12-23 10:48:44,447 ERROR [org.jbo.res.rea.com.cor.AbstractResteasyReactiveContext] (vert.x-eventloop-thread-1) Request failed: jakarta.persistence.PersistenceException: org.hibernate.HibernateException: io.vertx.pgclient.PgException: ERROR: syntax error at or near "," (42601)
        at org.hibernate.internal.ExceptionConverterImpl.convert(ExceptionConverterImpl.java:154)
        at org.hibernate.internal.ExceptionConverterImpl.convert(ExceptionConverterImpl.java:181)
        at org.hibernate.reactive.session.impl.ReactiveExceptionConverter.convert(ReactiveExceptionConverter.java:31)
        at org.hibernate.reactive.session.impl.ReactiveSessionImpl.lambda$doFlush$33(ReactiveSessionImpl.java:938)
        at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.uniHandle(CompletableFuture.java:934)
        at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture$UniHandle.tryFire(CompletableFuture.java:911)
        at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.postComplete(CompletableFuture.java:510)
        at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.completeExceptionally(CompletableFuture.java:2162)
        at io.vertx.core.Future.lambda$toCompletionStage$3(Future.java:386)
        at io.vertx.core.impl.future.FutureImpl$3.onFailure(FutureImpl.java:153)
        at io.vertx.core.impl.future.FutureBase.emitFailure(FutureBase.java:75)
        at io.vertx.core.impl.future.FutureImpl.tryFail(FutureImpl.java:230)
        at io.vertx.core.impl.future.PromiseImpl.tryFail(PromiseImpl.java:23)
        at io.vertx.sqlclient.impl.QueryResultBuilder.tryFail(QueryResultBuilder.java:116)
        at io.vertx.core.Promise.fail(Promise.java:89)
        at io.vertx.core.Promise.handle(Promise.java:53)
        at io.vertx.core.Promise.handle(Promise.java:29)
        at io.vertx.core.impl.future.FutureImpl$3.onFailure(FutureImpl.java:153)
        at io.vertx.core.impl.future.FutureBase.emitFailure(FutureBase.java:75)
        at io.vertx.core.impl.future.FutureImpl.tryFail(FutureImpl.java:230)
        at io.vertx.core.impl.future.PromiseImpl.tryFail(PromiseImpl.java:23)
        at io.vertx.core.impl.future.PromiseImpl.onFailure(PromiseImpl.java:54)
        at io.vertx.core.impl.future.PromiseImpl.handle(PromiseImpl.java:43)
        at io.vertx.sqlclient.impl.TransactionImpl.lambda$wrap$0(TransactionImpl.java:72)
        at io.vertx.core.impl.future.FutureImpl$3.onFailure(FutureImpl.java:153)

Caused by: org.hibernate.HibernateException: io.vertx.pgclient.PgException: ERROR: syntax error at or near "," (42601)
        ... 32 more
Caused by: io.vertx.pgclient.PgException: ERROR: syntax error at or near "," (42601)
        at io.vertx.pgclient.impl.codec.ErrorResponse.toException(ErrorResponse.java:31)
        at io.vertx.pgclient.impl.codec.PrepareStatementCommandCodec.handleErrorResponse(PrepareStatementCommandCodec.java:90)
        at io.vertx.pgclient.impl.codec.PgDecoder.decodeError(PgDecoder.java:246)
        at io.vertx.pgclient.impl.codec.PgDecoder.decodeMessage(PgDecoder.java:132)
        at io.vertx.pgclient.impl.codec.PgDecoder.channelRead(PgDecoder.java:112)
        at io.netty.channel.CombinedChannelDuplexHandler.channelRead(CombinedChannelDuplexHandler.java:251)
        at io.netty.channel.AbstractChannelHandlerContext.invokeChannelRead(AbstractChannelHandlerContext.java:379)
        at io.netty.channel.AbstractChannelHandlerContext.invokeChannelRead(AbstractChannelHandlerContext.java:365)
        at io.netty.channel.AbstractChannelHandlerContext.fireChannelRead(AbstractChannelHandlerContext.java:357)
        at io.netty.channel.DefaultChannelPipeline$HeadContext.channelRead(DefaultChannelPipeline.java:1410)
        at io.netty.channel.AbstractChannelHandlerContext.invokeChannelRead(AbstractChannelHandlerContext.java:379)
        at io.netty.channel.AbstractChannelHandlerContext.invokeChannelRead(AbstractChannelHandlerContext.java:365)
        at io.netty.channel.DefaultChannelPipeline.fireChannelRead(DefaultChannelPipeline.java:919)
        at io.netty.channel.nio.AbstractNioByteChannel$NioByteUnsafe.read(AbstractNioByteChannel.java:166)
        at io.netty.channel.nio.NioEventLoop.processSelectedKey(NioEventLoop.java:788)
        at io.netty.channel.nio.NioEventLoop.processSelectedKeysOptimized(NioEventLoop.java:724)

        at io.netty.channel.nio.NioEventLoop.run(NioEventLoop.java:562)
        ... 4 more

```

**Thoughts:** I am wondering if there is something special about `QuarkusPostgreSQL10Dialect` that is not in `PostgisDialect` that is screwing up the `insert` statement in Hibernate Reactive.

### Expected behavior

Hibernate Reactive with PostGIS and Hibernate Spatial `persist` succeeds 

### Actual behavior

Hibernate Reactive with PostGIS and Hibernate Spatial `persist` fails with:

```
jakarta.persistence.PersistenceException: org.hibernate.HibernateException: io.vertx.pgclient.PgException: ERROR: syntax error at or near "," 
```


### How to Reproduce?

Reproducer: https://github.com/murphye/quarkus-reproducer

1. `mvn clean quarkus:dev`
2. `curl -X POST http://localhost:8080/tenant`
3. Observe Hibernate debug logs and `org.hibernate.HibernateException`

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Linux localhost.localdomain 5.14.0-162.6.1.el9_1.0.1.x86_64 #1 SMP PREEMPT_DYNAMIC Mon Nov 28 18:44:09 UTC 2022 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "17.0.5" 2022-10-18

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

OpenJDK Runtime Environment GraalVM CE 22.3.0 (build 17.0.5+8-jvmci-22.3-b08)

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.0.0.Alpha2

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.6.3 

### Additional information

_No response_
